column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////This was one of our stops on a food tour. Had the pepperoni pizza
column2: really enjoyed it a lot. The crust was excellent and the sauce was not sour or acidic. Lots and lots of mozzarella cheese. Very flavorful. Menu is varied and they have salads
column4: and thin crust pizza. Next time I am in Chicago we are returning for sure.
